trans-unit.source: A core feature of Cypress that assists with testing dynamic web applications is retry-ability. Like a good transmission in a car, it usually works without you noticing it. But understanding how it works will help you write faster tests with fewer run-time surprises.
trans-unit.target: Cypress协助测试动态网络应用的一个核心功能是重试性。就像汽车中的好变速箱一样,它通常在你没有注意到的情况下工作。但了解它的工作原理将帮助你编写更快的测试,减少运行时的意外。

trans-unit.source: A fixture is a fixed set of data located in a file that is used in your tests. Fixtures are accessed within tests by calling the cy.fixture() command.
trans-unit.target: 固定装置是位于测试中使用的文件中的一组固定数据。测试夹具的目的是确保在众所周知的固定环境中进行测试，以便结果可重复。通过调用 cy.fixture() 命令在测试中访问灯具。

trans-unit.source: A single command followed by multiple assertions retries each one of them – in order. Thus when the first assertion passes, the command will be retried with first and second assertion. When the first and second assertion pass, then the command will be retried with the first, second, and third assertion, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 单个命令后跟多个断言将按顺序重试每个命令。因此，当第一个断言通过时，将使用第一和第二个断言重试命令。当第一和第二断言通过时，将使用第一，第二和第三断言重试命令，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: A spy does not modify the behavior of the function - it is left perfectly intact. A spy is most useful when you are testing the contract between multiple functions and you don’t care about the side effects the real function may create (if any).
trans-unit.target: 一个间谍并没有修改函数的行为-这是留给一个白璧无瑕。在测试多个功能之间的契约时，间谍程序最有用，而且您不必担心实际功能可能产生的副作用（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: A spy gives you the ability to “spy” on a function, by letting you capture and then assert that the function was called with the right arguments, or that the function was called a certain number of times, or even what the return value was or what context the function was called with.
trans-unit.target: 通过让您捕获然后断言该函数是用正确的参数调用的，或者该函数被调用了一定的次数，甚至是返回值，间谍可以让您“窥探”函数。或调用函数的上下文。

trans-unit.source: A stub is a way to modify a function and delegate control overs its behavior to you (the programmer).
trans-unit.target: stub是一种修改函数的方式,并将控制权委托给你(程序员)。

trans-unit.source: A stub is most commonly used in a unit test but is still useful during some integration/e2e tests.
trans-unit.target: stub最常用于单元测试,但在一些集成/e2e测试中仍然有用。

trans-unit.source: Accessing the DOM elements returned from the query works differently, however:
trans-unit.target: 然而,访问从查询中返回的DOM元素的工作方式有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Action commands will now insert an artificial delay after resolving to enable modern JavaScript frameworks time to flush their run loops. snapshots are delayed until after the action, resulting in more accurate snapshots because JavaScript frameworks would not process these DOM events until N milliseconds after they occurred. This has the unfortunate side effect of decreasing performance by about 5-10% but the end result is that it is much easier to debug and Cypress is less prone to flake caused by modern JavaScript frameworks. This change comes after collecting many data points and this was one of the easiest changes that help reduce flake. For users that don’t use the latest and greatest JavaScript frameworks, this action delay can be reduced through cypress.json which may speed up large test suites.
trans-unit.target: 现在，动作命令将在解决后插入人为延迟，以使现代JavaScript框架有时间刷新其运行循环。快照将延迟到执行该操作之后，这样才能获得更准确的快照，因为JavaScript框架要在事件发生 N 毫秒后才处理这些DOM事件。不幸的是，这种副作用使性能降低了约5-10％但是最终结果是它易于调试，并且赛普拉斯不太容易因现代JavaScript框架而产生片状现象。此更改是在收集了许多数据点之后得出的，这是最容易减少碎片的最简单更改之一。对于不使用最新和最好的JavaScript框架的用户，可以通过 cypress.json 减少此操作延迟，这可以加快大型测试套件的速度。

trans-unit.source: Adding New Assertions
trans-unit.target: 添加新断言

trans-unit.source: Adding a baseUrl can also save some time during the initial startup of your Cypress tests.
trans-unit.target: 在首次启动Cypress测试时，添加 baseUrl 还可以节省一些时间。

trans-unit.source: Adding a baseUrl in your configuration allows you to omit passing the baseUrl to commands like cy.visit() and cy.request(). Cypress assumes this is the url you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 添加 baseUrl 在您的配置，您可以省略传递 baseUrl 的命令一样 cy.visit() 和 cy.request() 。赛普拉斯假定这是您要使用的URL。

trans-unit.source: Adding a tsconfig.json inside your cypress folder with the following configuration should get intelligent code completion working.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下配置在您的 cypress 文件夹内添加 tsconfig.json 可以使智能代码完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Adding an alias using .as() to spies makes them easier to identify in error messages and Cypress’ command log.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .as() 向间谍添加别名可以使它们更容易在错误消息和赛普拉斯的命令日志中识别。

trans-unit.source: Adding an alias using .as() to stubs makes them easier to identify in error messages and Cypress’s command log.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .as() 向存根添加别名可以使它们更容易在错误消息和赛普拉斯的命令日志中识别。

trans-unit.source: Adding an attribute called data-cypress-ignore to an element will prevent the internal Cypress proxy from rewriting any of its content or attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上添加名为 data-cypress-ignore 的属性将防止内部Cypress代理重写其任何内容或属性。

trans-unit.source: Adding custom properties to the global window with the right TypeScript type
trans-unit.target: 使用正确的TypeScript类型将自定义属性添加到全局 window

trans-unit.source: Adding delay can help simulate real world network latency. Normally stubbed responses return in under 20ms. Adding a delay can help you visualize how your application’s state reacts to requests that are in flight.
trans-unit.target: 添加延迟可以帮助模拟现实世界的网络延迟。正常情况下，响应响应延迟不到20ms。添加延迟可以帮助您可视化应用程序的状态如何响应进行中的请求。

trans-unit.source: Adding more commands and assertions
trans-unit.target: 增加更多的命令和断言

trans-unit.source: Adding npm scripts
trans-unit.target: 添加npm脚本

trans-unit.source: Adding validations is optional. Passing { prevSubject: true } will require a subject, but not validate its type.
trans-unit.target: 添加验证是可选的。传递 { prevSubject: true } 将需要一个主题，但不验证其类型。

trans-unit.source: Additional arguments to be given to the function call. There is no limit to the number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 函数调用的附加参数。对参数的数量没有限制。

trans-unit.target: 要打印到赛普拉斯命令日志的其他参数。对参数的数量没有限制。

trans-unit.target: 要发送的附加头文件;接受对象的文字说明。

trans-unit.source: Additional information
trans-unit.target: 其他信息

trans-unit.source: Additionally change events will be fired either when the {enter} key is pressed (and the value has changed since the last focus event), or whenever the element loses focus. This matches browser behavior.
trans-unit.target: 另外，按下 {enter} 键（并且自上次焦点事件以来值已更改）或元素失去焦点时，都会触发 change 事件。这与浏览器行为匹配。

trans-unit.source: Additionally Cypress handles these 4 other situations as defined in the spec:
trans-unit.target: 另外赛普拉斯还处理了规范中定义的这4种其他情况。

trans-unit.source: Additionally an element is considered hidden if:
trans-unit.target: 此外,一个元素在以下情况下被认为是隐藏的:

trans-unit.source: Additionally if the mousedown event causes the element to be removed from the DOM, the remaining events should continue to be fired, but to the resulting element left below the removed element. This has also not been implemented. Open an issue if you need this to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果 mousedown 事件导致该元素从DOM中删除，则其余事件应继续触发，但将结果元素留在已删除元素下方。这也没有实现。如果您需要解决此问题，请打开一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Additionally we’ll display a red “hitbox” - which is a dot indicating the coordinates of the event.
trans-unit.target: 另外，我们将显示一个红色的“ hitbox”-一个点，指示事件的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Additionally we’ve integrated the tests run into the Cypress Test Runner. This means you can see the tests run in the Runs tab from within every project.
trans-unit.target: 另外，我们将测试运行集成到了Cypress Test Runner中。这意味着您可以在每个项目的“ 运行”选项卡中查看运行的测试。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Cypress automatically sets the viewport to its default size between each test.
trans-unit.target: 此外,Cypress会在每次测试之间自动将视口设置为默认大小。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Cypress will automatically capture screenshots when a failure happens during runs outside of interactive mode.
trans-unit.target: 此外,当交互模式以外的运行过程中发生故障时,Cypress会自动捕捉屏幕截图。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Cypress will respect and await promises you return. This enables you to perform asynchronous tasks and eventually resolve with the modified configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 此外,Cypress会尊重并等待你返回的承诺。这使你能够执行异步任务,并最终用修改后的配置对象解决。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Cypress will respect and await promises you return. This enables you to perform asynchronous tasks and eventually resolve with the modified configuration object. See the example on switching between multiple configuration files for a full example.
trans-unit.target: 此外，赛普拉斯将尊重您并等待您返回的承诺。这使您可以执行异步任务，并最终使用修改后的配置对象进行解析。有关完整示例，请参见有关在多个配置文件之间切换的示例。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Mocha gives us excellent async support. Cypress has extended Mocha, sanding off the rough edges, weird edge cases, bugs, and error messages. These fixes are all completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: 此外，Mocha还为我们提供了出色的 async 支持。赛普拉斯（Cypress）扩展了摩卡（Mocha），消除了粗糙的边缘，怪异的边缘情况，错误和错误消息。这些修复程序都是完全透明的。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, events that cause a change event to fire (such as typing {enter}) will display with the change event column as true.
trans-unit.target: 此外，导致 change 事件触发的事件（例如，键入 {enter} ）将在 change 事件列中显示为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it is often much easier to use cy.debug() or cy.pause() when debugging your test code.
trans-unit.target: 此外，调试测试代码时，使用 cy.debug() 或 cy.pause() 通常会容易得多。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it makes it clear to everyone that this element is used directly by test code.
trans-unit.target: 此外,它还让大家明白,这个元素是直接被测试代码使用的。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, testing through an OAuth provider is mutable - you will first need a real user on their service and then modifying anything on that user might affect other tests downstream.
trans-unit.target: 此外,通过OAuth提供商进行的测试是可以突变的--你首先需要在他们的服务上有一个真实的用户,然后修改该用户上的任何东西都可能影响下游的其他测试。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the result of the last Cypress command in the callback function will be yielded as the new subject and flow into the next command if there is no return.
trans-unit.target: 此外，回调函数中最后一个Cypress命令的结果将作为新主题产生，如果没有 return ,则流入下一个命令。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, we’ve made the browsers spawned by Cypress look different than regular sessions. You’ll see a darker theme around the chrome of the browser. You’ll always be able to visually distinguish these.
trans-unit.target: 此外，我们使赛普拉斯产生的浏览器看起来与常规会话不同。您会在浏览器的镶边中看到一个较暗的主题。您将始终能够在视觉上区分这些。

trans-unit.source: Adds Authorization headers. Accepts these options.
trans-unit.target: 添加授权标头。接受这些选项。

trans-unit.target: 添加基本授权标题

trans-unit.target: 添加XPath命令。这个repo也是一个很好的例子,使用自定义命令来进行重试,提供TypeScript定义等。

trans-unit.source: After scrolling the element, if we determine that it is still being covered up, we will continue to scroll and “nudge” the page until it becomes visible. This most frequently happens when you have position: fixed or position: sticky navigation elements which are fixed to the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 滚动元素后，如果我们确定该元素仍被掩盖，则将继续滚动并“微移”页面，直到它变得可见为止。当您具有 position: fixed 在页面顶部的位置：固定或 position: sticky 导航元素时，这种情况最常发生。

trans-unit.source: After setting up your project, Cypress inserted a unique projectId into your cypress.json. If you’re using source control, we recommend that you check your cypress.json including the projectId into source control.
trans-unit.target: 设置完项目后，赛普拉斯将唯一的projectId插入到 cypress.json 中。如果您使用的是源代码管理，我们建议您检查 cypress.json ,并将 projectId 包含到源代码管理中。

trans-unit.source: After starting a server:
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器后。

trans-unit.source: After the first cy.visit() command is issued in a test, Cypress changes its URL to match the origin of your remote application, thereby solving the first major hurdle of same-origin policy. Your application’s code executes the same as it does outside of Cypress, and everything works as expected.
trans-unit.target: 在测试中发出第一个 cy.visit() 命令后，赛普拉斯更改其URL以匹配您的远程应用程序的来源，从而解决了 same-origin policy 的第一个主要障碍。应用程序的代码执行与Cypress外部执行的代码相同，并且一切正常。

trans-unit.source: After the tests complete, the final code coverage is saved to a .nyc_output folder. It is a JSON file from which we can generate a report in a variety of formats. The @cypress/code-coverage plugin generates the HTML report automatically - you can open the coverage/index.html page locally after the tests finish. You can also call nyc report to generate other reports, for example, sending the coverage information to 3rd party services.
trans-unit.target: 测试完成后，最终代码覆盖率将保存到 .nyc_output 文件夹。这是一个JSON文件，我们可以从中生成各种格式的报告。该 @cypress/code-coverage 插件自动生成HTML报告-你可以打开 coverage/index.html 页面后，在本地测试完成。您还可以调用 nyc report 来生成其他报告，例如，将承保范围信息发送给第三方服务。

trans-unit.source: After this update if you are seeing <iframe> origin errors please let us know by opening an issue. We will screen-share with you to diagnose the issue. We’re no longer aware of any situation where this should happen, so if you’re experiencing these bugs, please help us track them down.
trans-unit.target: 此更新，如果你看到后 <iframe> 起源错误，请让我们知道通过打开的问题。我们将与您共享屏幕以诊断问题。我们不再知道应该发生这种情况的任何情况，因此，如果您遇到这些错误，请帮助我们对其进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: After we verify the element is actionable, Cypress will then fire all of the appropriate events and corresponding default actions. Usually these events’ coordinates are fired at the center of the element, but most commands enable you to change the position it’s fired to.
trans-unit.target: 在我们确认该元素是可操作的之后，赛普拉斯将触发所有适当的事件和相应的默认操作。通常，这些事件的坐标在元素的中心触发，但是大多数命令使您可以更改其触发位置。

trans-unit.target: 当你对DOM元素进行别名后,以后就可以访问它们进行重用。

trans-unit.target: 别名路线

trans-unit.source: Aliased commands now correctly output a command log again when they are replayed.

trans-unit.source: Aliases
trans-unit.target: Aliases

trans-unit.source: Aliases are a powerful construct in Cypress that have many uses. We’ll explore each of their capabilities below.
trans-unit.target: 别名是赛普拉斯的一种强大功能，具有许多用途。我们将在下面探讨其每个功能。

trans-unit.source: Aliases can also be used with requests.
trans-unit.target: 别名也可以用于请求。

trans-unit.source: Aliases can also be used with routes. Aliasing your routes enables you to:
trans-unit.target: 别名也可以与路由一起使用。通过对路线进行别名处理，您可以：

trans-unit.source: Aliases can be set on a per-request basis by setting the alias property of the intercepted request.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置拦截的请求的 alias 属性来基于每个请求设置别名。

trans-unit.source: Aliases can be set on a per-request basis by setting the alias property of the intercepted request:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置被拦截请求的 alias 属性来为每个请求设置别名：

trans-unit.source: Aliases have other special characteristics when being used with DOM elements.
trans-unit.target: 当与DOM元素一起使用时,别名有其他的特殊性。

trans-unit.source: Aliases of routes display in the routes instrument panel:
trans-unit.target: 途径的别名显示在途径仪表盘中。

trans-unit.source: Aliases which replay their commands will no longer break the current chain and therefore not unintentionally null our their subject for the ext command.
trans-unit.target: 重放命令的别名将不再中断当前链,因此不会无意中使ext命令的主题无效。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing cy.fixture() data and then using this to access it via the alias.
trans-unit.target: 混叠 cy.fixture() 的数据，然后使用 this 通过该别名来访问它。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing a DOM element and then using cy.get() to access the aliased element.
trans-unit.target: 别名为DOM元素，然后使用 cy.get() 访问别名的元素。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing a route and then using cy.wait() to wait for the aliased route.
trans-unit.target: 别名路由，然后使用 cy.wait() 等待别名路由。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing custom commands now intelligently figures out where to apply the alias without being specified inside of the actual custom command.
trans-unit.target: 别名自定义命令现在可以智能地找出应用别名的位置,而无需在实际的自定义命令中指定。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing individual GraphQL requests
trans-unit.target: 对单个GraphQL请求进行别名

trans-unit.source: Aliasing individual requests
trans-unit.target: 个别请求的别名

trans-unit.source: All cy.fixture() extensions are now supported and Cypress will no longer throw on extensions it doesn’t recognize. For known fixture extensions we’ll continue to apply a default encoding and for everything else it will default to utf8. Fixes #200.
trans-unit.target: 现在支持所有 cy.fixture() 扩展，赛普拉斯将不再抛出它无法识别的扩展。对于已知的灯具扩展，我们将继续应用默认 encoding ，对于所有其他内容，它将默认为 utf8 。修复＃200。

trans-unit.source: All after() hooks run (once)
trans-unit.target: 所有 after() 钩子都运行一次

trans-unit.source: All before() hooks run (once)
trans-unit.target: 所有 before() 钩子都运行一次

trans-unit.source: All ng based commands now display in the Command Log.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有基于 ng 的命令都会显示在命令日志中。

trans-unit.source: All Assertions
trans-unit.target: 所有断言

trans-unit.source: All Chrome* flavored browsers will be detected and are supported.
trans-unit.target: 所有Chrome*口味的浏览器都会被检测到并支持。

trans-unit.source: All Chromium-based browsers, including Electron, have chromium set as their family property.
trans-unit.target: 所有基于Chromium的浏览器，包括Electron，都将 chromium 设置为其 family 属性。

trans-unit.source: All Cypress related services have been updated to use HTTPS. We are forcing HTTPS redirects for everything except for api.cypress.io, which would be a breaking change. By the next minor release we will force that as well. Once we make this change we will remove all versions below 0.13.7. So make sure you are not locking the Cypress version when running in CI. We periodically remove old Cypress versions which have security flaws and this is an example of one.
trans-unit.target: 所有与赛普拉斯相关的服务已更新为使用HTTPS。我们正在强制对除 api.cypress.io 以外的所有内容进行HTTPS重定向，这将是一个重大更改。在下一个次要版本中，我们也将强制这样做。进行更改后，我们将删除所有低于 0.13.7 的版本。因此，请确保在CI中运行时未锁定Cypress版本。我们会定期删除存在安全漏洞的赛普拉斯旧版本，这是一个示例。

trans-unit.source: All DOM based commands automatically wait for their elements to exist in the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 所有基于DOM的命令都会自动等待其元素在DOM中存在。

trans-unit.source: All XHR’s (regardless of whether they are stubbed or not) are now logged in the Command Log. Stubbed XHR’s display as “XHR Stub” vs vanilla “XHR”.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有XHR（无论是否已存根）都记录在命令日志中。XHR存根显示为“ XHR存根”与香草“ XHR”。

trans-unit.source: All assertions, whether they’re the default ones or whether they’ve been added by you all share the same timeout values.
trans-unit.target: 所有断言，无论它们是默认断言还是您添加的断言都共享相同的超时值。

trans-unit.source: All commands now retry if the associated element is disabled until the element is no longer disabled. If the command times out a specific error message is now thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关元素被禁用,所有命令现在都会重试,直到该元素不再被禁用。如果命令超时,现在会抛出一个特定的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: All commands with a long message (such as assertions) are automatically scaled down in font size and truncated properly. In addition, assertions will correctly bold the expected and actual values.
trans-unit.target: 具有长消息的所有命令（例如断言）将自动按比例缩小字体大小并正确截断。另外，断言将正确地加粗 expected 和 actual 值。

trans-unit.source: All current and future repositories will be included with this installation if you choose All repositories.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择“ 所有存储库”，则此安装中将包括所有当前和将来的存储库。

trans-unit.source: All elements are now logged out as real DOM elements instead of jQuery wrapped elements. This has several upsides. Chrome will allow you to immediately interact with these elements, drilling into their contents, displaying the element box model on hover, etc. This prevents you from having to expand the jQuery elements and click “Reveal in Elements Panel”.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有元素都作为真实的DOM元素而不是jQuery包装的元素注销。这有几个好处。Chrome浏览器将允许您立即与这些元素进行交互，深入研究它们的内容，在悬停时显示元素框模型等。这使您不必扩展jQuery元素并单击“在元素面板中显示”。

trans-unit.source: All error messages from using the CLI have been rewritten and improved.
trans-unit.target: 所有使用CLI的错误信息都已被重写和改进。

trans-unit.source: All incompatible a / link / form elements are transparently rewritten to be compatible including FQDN and protocol-less href / src.
trans-unit.target: 所有不兼容 a / link / form 元素都被透明地重写为兼容的，包括FQDN和无协议的 href / src 。

trans-unit.source: All of the normal events documented on .click() will fire.
trans-unit.target: .click() 上记录的所有常规事件都将触发。

trans-unit.source: All of Cypress’s commands, when clicked on within the Command Log, print extra information about the command, its subject, and its yielded result. Try clicking around the Command Log with your Developer Tools open! You may find some useful information here.
trans-unit.target: 在“ 命令日志”中单击时，所有Cypress的命令都会打印有关该命令，其主题及其产生的结果的更多信息。在开发人员工具打开的情况下，尝试单击命令日志！您可以在此处找到一些有用的信息。

trans-unit.source: All of the type docs have been updated to reflect these changes.
trans-unit.target: 所有类型的文档均已更新，以反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: All of the docs surrounding assertions, .should(), and .and() have been updated to reflect the new API.
trans-unit.target: 周围所有的文档的断言， .should() ，和 .and() 已更新，以反映新的API。

trans-unit.source: All of these functions come from Bundled Tools that Cypress bakes in.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些功能都来自赛普拉斯烘烤的捆绑工具。

trans-unit.source: All properties are optional. All properties that are set must match for the route to handle a request. If a string is passed to any property, it will be glob-matched against the request using minimatch.The available routeMatcher properties are listed below:
trans-unit.target: 所有属性都是可选的。设置的所有属性必须与路由匹配才能处理请求。如果将 string 传递给任何属性，则将使用 minimatch 将其与请求进行全局匹配。可用的 routeMatcher 属性在下面列出：

trans-unit.source: All responses are now streamed using content-encoding: chunked.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有响应都使用 content-encoding: chunked 流式传输。

trans-unit.source: All the cy.cookie commands have been upgraded to take new options and can do much more powerful things outside of the JavaScript sandbox.
trans-unit.target: 所有 cy.cookie 命令均已升级，可以采用新选项，并且可以在JavaScript沙箱之外执行更强大的功能。

trans-unit.source: All third party @types have been moved from Cypress dependencies into devDependencies. This should fix situations where user’s type dependencies were conflicting with Cypress’s third party type definitions. Fixes #3371 and #1227.
trans-unit.target: 所有第三方 @types 已从Cypress dependencies 移至 devDependencies 。这应该可以解决用户类型依赖项与赛普拉斯第三方类型定义冲突的情况。修复＃3371和＃1227。

trans-unit.source: All users must LOG IN AGAIN and re-add their projects. Sorry, we’ve changed the way we store local data.
trans-unit.target: 所有用户必须再次登录并重新添加他们的项目。抱歉，我们已经更改了存储本地数据的方式。

trans-unit.source: All we’re really doing here is creating a recursive function. Nothing more complicated than that.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里真正要做的就是创建一个递归函数。没有比这更复杂的了。

trans-unit.source: All you have to do is add that assertion and Cypress will reverse its rules waiting for elements to exist.
trans-unit.target: 您所要做的就是添加断言，赛普拉斯将逆转其规则，等待元素存在。

trans-unit.source: Alleviates the need to mantain brittle manual mocks by automating the recording and stubbing of requests.
trans-unit.target: 通过对请求的自动记录和存根,减轻了对手动模拟的维护需求。

trans-unit.source: Allow Multiple Types
trans-unit.target: 允许多种类型

trans-unit.source: Allow projects to be scrolled when >4 are added.
trans-unit.target: 添加> 4时，允许滚动项目。

trans-unit.source: Allow recording API results and replaying the APIs as a mock server.
trans-unit.target: 允许记录API结果,并作为模拟服务器重放API。

trans-unit.source: Allow timers and animations to keep running
trans-unit.target: 允许定时器和动画继续运行

trans-unit.source: Allows a single argument only
trans-unit.target: 只允许一个参数

trans-unit.source: Allows blocked pop-ups.
trans-unit.target: 允许阻止弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Allows callback function argument
trans-unit.target: 允许回调函数参数

trans-unit.source: Allows for dynamic values between different machines.
trans-unit.target: 允许不同机器之间的动态值。

trans-unit.source: Almost all commands can time out in some way.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有的命令都能以某种方式超时。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the App Preview pane has updated further after the click, following the link and showing the destination page:
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，单击后，链接之后并显示目标页面，“ 应用程序预览”窗格已进一步更新：

trans-unit.source: Also take a look at "Logging in" recipes.
trans-unit.target: 还可以看看“登录”食谱。

trans-unit.source: Alt click
trans-unit.target: Alt点击

trans-unit.source: Alternate commands and assertions
trans-unit.target: 备用命令和断言

trans-unit.source: Alternatively a better solution to this problem is by waiting explicitly for an aliased route.
trans-unit.target: 另外,解决这个问题的一个更好的办法是明确地等待一个别名路由。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you are creating users, it might just be easier to create the user and set whether you want the wizard to be shown ahead of time. That would avoid this check later.

trans-unit.source: Another benefit of using cy.wait() on requests is that it allows you to access the actual XHR object. This is useful when you want to make assertions about this object.
trans-unit.target: 在请求上使用 cy.wait() 的另一个好处是，它允许您访问实际的 XHR 对象。当您想对此对象进行断言时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Another more balanced approach is just to integrate both strategies. You likely want to have a single test that takes a true e2e approach and stubs nothing. It’ll use the feature for real - including seeding the database and setting up state.
trans-unit.target: 另一个更平衡的方法就是将两种策略整合在一起。您可能希望有一个采用真正的 e2e 方法并且不进行任何存根测试的测试。它将真正使用该功能-包括为数据库设置种子和设置状态。

trans-unit.source: Another possibility is visual regression testing: comparing screenshots of past runs with the current run to ensure that nothing changed. Read about how to implement visual testing.
trans-unit.target: 另一种可能性是视觉回归测试：将过去运行的屏幕截图与当前运行的屏幕截图进行比较，以确保没有任何变化。阅读有关如何实施视觉测试的信息。

trans-unit.source: Another potential problem to be aware of is that our own Command Log is using React under the hood and only rendering asynchronously during an animation frame. It is possible you will see screenshots taken before our Command Log is done rendering. This means you may not see the error displayed in the screenshot. But this is also why we take a video - to show you the complete failure.
trans-unit.target: 要意识到的另一个潜在问题是我们自己的命令日志在后台使用React，并且仅在动画帧期间异步渲染。在我们的命令日志渲染完成之前，您可能会看到截图。这意味着您可能看不到截图中显示的错误。但这也是我们拍摄视频的原因-向您展示完整的失败。

trans-unit.source: Another upside is that this enables you to build out your application without needing the contract of the server to exist. You can build it the way you want the data to be structured, and even test all of the edge cases, without needing a server.
trans-unit.target: 另一个好处是，这使您可以构建应用程序而无需使用服务器合同。您可以使用所需的数据结构来构建它，甚至不需要服务器就可以测试所有边缘情况。

trans-unit.source: Another valid approach opposed to seeding and talking to your server is to just bypass it altogether. Much simpler!
trans-unit.target: 另一个反对播种和与服务器对话的有效方法是完全绕过它。简单多了!

trans-unit.source: Another valid strategy would be to embed data directly into the DOM - but do so in a way where this data is always present and query-able. It would have to be present 100% of the time, else this would not work.
trans-unit.target: 另一种有效的策略是将数据直接嵌入到DOM中，但是要以始终存在且可查询数据的方式进行。它必须存在100％的时间，否则将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Another valid strategy would be to embed data directly into the DOM but to do so in a way that the data is always present and query-able. The data would have to be present 100% of the time, otherwise this strategy would not work.
trans-unit.target: 另一种有效的策略是将数据直接嵌入到DOM中，但是这样做必须使数据始终存在并且可以查询。数据必须在100％的时间内显示，否则此策略将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: As a rule of thumb anything you call from Cypress affects global state. Anything you call from cy affects local state.
trans-unit.target: 根据经验，从 Cypress 调用的任何内容都会影响全局状态。您从 cy 调用的任何内容都会影响本地状态。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, check out the recipe leveraging Chrome remote debugging to set pseudo classes like hover.
trans-unit.target: 作为解决方法，请查看利用Chrome远程调试设置诸如 hover 之类的伪类的方法。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, you may be able to use window.postMessage to directly communicate with these iframes and control them (if the 3rd party iframe supports it).
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，您可以使用 window.postMessage 直接与这些iframe进行通信并对其进行控制（如果第三方iframe支持）。

trans-unit.source: As configuration behavior for all requests.
trans-unit.target: 作为所有请求的配置行为。

trans-unit.source: As defaults that are merged into cy.route().
trans-unit.target: 作为默认值合并到 cy.route() 中。

trans-unit.source: As each CI machine finishes running its assigned spec file, more spec files are distributed to it. This process repeats until all spec files are complete.
trans-unit.target: 当每台 CI 机器完成运行其分配的规范文件时,更多的规范文件会被分发到它那里。这个过程重复进行,直到所有的规范文件都完成。

trans-unit.source: As more and more tests are recorded to the Cypress Dashboard, Cypress can better predict how long a given spec file will take to run. To prevent irrelevant data from affecting the duration prediction, Cypress doesn’t use old historical run data regarding the spec file.
trans-unit.target: 随着越来越多的测试记录到赛普拉斯仪表板上，赛普拉斯可以更好地预测给定规格文件的运行时间。为了防止无关的数据影响持续时间的预测，赛普拉斯不使用有关规格文件的旧的历史运行数据。

trans-unit.source: As noted in the Arguments above, you can also set prevSubject to one of:
trans-unit.target: 如以上参数所述，您还可以将 prevSubject 设置为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: As of Cypress version 3.0, Cypress downloads its binary to the global system cache - on linux that is ~/.cache/Cypress. By ensuring this cache persists across builds you can shave minutes off install time by preventing a large binary download.
trans-unit.target: 从赛普拉斯3.0版开始，赛普拉斯将其二进制文件下载到Linux上的全局系统缓存 ~/.cache/Cypress 。通过确保此高速缓存在所有版本中均保持不变，您可以通过防止下载大量二进制文件来节省安装时间。

trans-unit.source: As of 1.2.0 you can programmatically modify configuration values using Node code. This enables you to do things like use fs and read off configuration values and dynamically change them.
trans-unit.target: 从 1.2.0 版开始,您可以使用Node代码以编程方式修改配置值。这使您能够执行诸如使用 fs 之类的事情，并读取配置值并动态更改它们。

trans-unit.source: As of 0.20.0, you can also bind to Events that Cypress fires as it’s working with your element. Using a debugger with these events will give you a much lower level view into how Cypress works.
trans-unit.target: 从 0.20.0 开始，您还可以绑定赛普拉斯在与元素一起工作时触发的事件。将调试器与这些事件一起使用将使您对赛普拉斯的工作方式有一个较低的了解。

trans-unit.source: As of version 0.19.0 and CLI versions 0.13.0, the cypress ci command has been deprecated. We did this to make it clearer what the difference was between a regular test run and a recorded test run.
trans-unit.target: 从 0.19.0 版和CLI版本 0.13.0 开始，不建议使用 cypress ci 命令。我们这样做是为了更清楚常规测试和记录的测试之间的区别。

trans-unit.source: As of version 0.20.0 Cypress is also a fully baked node_module you can require in your Node scripts.
trans-unit.target: 从 0.20.0 版开始，赛普拉斯还是您可以在Node脚本中要求的完全烘焙的 node_module 。

trans-unit.source: As of version 3.0, Cypress downloads the matching Cypress binary to the global system cache, so that the binary can be shared between projects. By default, global cache folders are:
trans-unit.target: 从 3.0 版开始，赛普拉斯会将匹配的赛普拉斯二进制文件下载到全局系统缓存中，以便可以在项目之间共享该二进制文件。默认情况下，全局缓存文件夹为：

trans-unit.source: As of version 3.0, the binary is downloaded to a global cache directory to be used across projects.
trans-unit.target: 从 3.0 版开始，二进制文件将下载到全局缓存目录中，以便在项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: As part of your code transpilation pipeline using the babel-plugin-istanbul tool.
trans-unit.target: 作为使用 babel-plugin-istanbul 工具的代码转换管道的一部分。

trans-unit.source: As soon as it encounters a cy.visit(), Cypress then switches to the url of the main window to the url specified in your visit. This can result in a ‘flash’ or ‘reload’ when your tests first start.
trans-unit.target: 一旦遇到 cy.visit() ，赛普拉斯便将主窗口的URL切换到您访问中指定的URL。首次启动测试时，可能会导致“刷新”或“重新加载”。

trans-unit.source: As we continue to save our new test file we’ll see the browser auto reloading in real time.
trans-unit.target: 随着我们继续保存新的测试文件，我们将看到浏览器实时自动重新加载。

trans-unit.source: As we get closer to a public release we’ve decided to focus on onboarding new users and new projects. We’ve made several breaking changes to help with this process.
trans-unit.target: 随着我们接近公开发布，我们已决定将重点放在新用户和新项目的入门上。我们进行了一些重大更改以帮助完成此过程。

trans-unit.source: As we just mentioned, logging in is one of those features that are mission critical and should likely involve your server. We recommend you test signup and login using your UI as a real user would:
trans-unit.target: 正如我们刚刚提到的，登录是任务关键的功能之一，可能会涉及您的服务器。我们建议您以实际用户身份使用用户界面测试注册和登录：

trans-unit.source: As we mentioned previously in this guide:
trans-unit.target: 正如我们之前在本指南中提到的。

trans-unit.source: As we saw in the initial example, Cypress makes it easy to click on and type into elements on the page by using .click() and .type() commands with a cy.get() or cy.contains() command. This is a great example of chaining in action. Let’s see it again:
trans-unit.target: 正如我们在最初的示例中看到的那样，赛普拉斯通过将 .click() 和 .type() 命令与 cy.get() 或 cy.contains() 命令一起使用，可以轻松单击并在页面上键入内容。这是连锁行动的一个很好的例子。让我们再看一遍：

trans-unit.source: As we showed above, Cypress anticipates the asynchronous nature of web applications and doesn’t fail immediately the first time an element is not found. Instead, Cypress gives your app a window of time to finish whatever it may be doing!
trans-unit.target: 如上所示，赛普拉斯预见了Web应用程序的异步特性，并且不会在首次发现元素时立即失败。取而代之的是，赛普拉斯为您的应用提供了一个时间窗口来完成它可能要做的一切！

trans-unit.source: As you approach infinity your confidence does continue to rise on the chances you could prove the desired state will be reached, but you can never prove it will. Instead you could theoretically be waiting for the heat death of the universe for a condition to come that is only a moment away from happening. There is no way to prove or disprove that it may conditionally happen.
trans-unit.target: 当您接近无穷大时，您可以证明已经达到期望状态的机会确实会增加信心，但是您永远无法证明会达到期望状态。相反，从理论上讲，您可以等待宇宙的热死，以等待距离发生仅一刻之遥的情况。没有任何方法可以证明或反驳它可能有条件地发生。

trans-unit.source: As you can see the documentation of MouseEvent, most properties of event class instances are read-only. Because of that, it’s sometimes impossible to set the value of some properties like pageX, pageY. This can be problematic in when testing some situations.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见， MouseEvent 的文档，事件类实例的大多数属性都是只读的。因此，有时无法设置诸如 pageX ， pageY 之类的某些属性的值。在测试某些情况时，这可能会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, Cypress does a lot of extra work to ensure the state of the application matches what our commands expect about it. Each command may resolve quickly (so fast you won’t see them in a pending state) but others may take seconds, or even dozens of seconds to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，赛普拉斯做了很多额外的工作来确保应用程序的状态与我们的命令期望的相符。每个命令可能很快就会解决（很快，您就不会看到它们处于挂起状态），但是其他命令可能需要几秒钟甚至几十秒钟才能解决。

trans-unit.source: As you write more and more end-to-end tests, you will find yourself wondering - do I need to write more tests? Are there parts of the application still untested? Are there parts of the application that perhaps are tested too much? One answer to those questions is to find out which lines of the application’s source code were executed during end-to-end tests. If there are important sections of the application’s logic that were not executed from the tests, then a new test should be added to ensure that part of our application logic is tested.
trans-unit.target: 随着编写越来越多的端到端测试，您会发现自己很纳闷-我是否需要编写更多测试？应用程序的某些部分是否仍未经测试？应用程序的某些部分是否经过过多测试？这些问题的一个答案是找出在端到端测试期间执行了应用程序源代码的哪些行。如果测试中未执行应用程序逻辑的重要部分，则应添加新测试，以确保测试了我们应用程序逻辑的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Assertion messages are no longer truncated, and instead will scale down by reducing the font-size and line-height after they exceed 110 characters. So you’ll now always see the full assertion message.

trans-unit.source: Assertions
trans-unit.target: Assertions

trans-unit.source: Assertions based around the window or document object no longer cause Chai to bomb on formatting their object structures (due to cylic references) and instead now will show up as <window> and <document>.
trans-unit.target: 基于 window 或 document 对象的断言不再导致Chai在格式化其对象结构时（由于循环引用）引起轰炸，而是现在将显示为 <window> 和 <document> 。

trans-unit.source: Assertions describe the desired state of your elements, your objects, and your application.
trans-unit.target: 断言描述元素，对象和应用程序的期望状态。

trans-unit.source: Assertions let you do things like ensuring an element is visible or has a particular attribute, CSS class, or state. Assertions are just commands that enable you to describe the desired state of your application. Cypress will automatically wait until your elements reach this state, or fail the test if the assertions don’t pass. Here’s a quick look at assertions in action:
trans-unit.target: 断言可让您执行诸如确保元素可见或具有特定属性，CSS类或状态的操作。断言只是使您能够描述应用程序所需状态的命令。如果断言没有通过，赛普拉斯将自动等待，直到您的元素达到该状态为止，否则将使测试失败。快速查看实际的断言：

trans-unit.source: Assertions running outside of a test are now properly handled in Cypress instead of throwing internal errors. Fixes #3926.
trans-unit.target: 现在，可以在赛普拉斯中正确处理在测试之外运行的断言，而不会引发内部错误。修复＃3926。

trans-unit.source: Assertions that involved an {exp} property are no longer incorrectly substituted with the #{this} subject.
trans-unit.target: 包含 {exp} 属性的断言不再被 #{this} 主题错误地替换。

trans-unit.source: Assertions which actually produced 2 assertions (under the hood) such as should('have.attr', 'href', '/users/1') will now only log the 2nd assertion, unless the first fails.
trans-unit.target: 实际生成2个断言（在 should('have.attr', 'href', '/users/1') ）的断言，例如should（'have.attr'，'href'，'/ users / 1'）现在将仅记录第二个断言，除非第一个断言失败。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous
trans-unit.target: Asynchronous

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous APIs are here to stay in JavaScript. They are found everywhere in modern code. In fact, most new browser APIs are asynchronous and many core Node modules are asynchronous as well.
trans-unit.target: 在JavaScript中,异步API将继续存在。它们在现代代码中随处可见。事实上,大多数新的浏览器API都是异步的,许多核心Node模块也是异步的。

trans-unit.source: At first, we’ll use them to make it easy to share objects between your hooks and your tests.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们将使用它们来简化在钩子和测试之间共享对象的过程。

trans-unit.source: At the moment, mouseover and mouseout events are not fired. Open an issue if you need this to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 目前，不会触发 mouseover 和 mouseout 事件。如果您需要解决此问题，请打开一个问题。

trans-unit.source: At the moment, we haven’t implemented an automatic way to recover from them, but it is actually possible for us to do so. We have an open issue documenting the steps we could take to restart the renderer process and continue the run. If you’re seeing consistent crashes and would like this implemented, please leave a note in the issue.
trans-unit.target: 目前，我们还没有实现从它们中恢复的自动方法，但是实际上我们可以这样做。我们有一个未解决的问题，记录了我们可以采取的重新启动渲染器过程并继续运行的步骤。如果您看到一致的崩溃，并希望此崩溃得以实施，请在问题中留言。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to .click() a select element will now throw an error. The error guides you to using the .select() command, as that is the command you should use to change a <select> value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试 .click() 选择元素现在将引发错误。该错误指导您使用 .select() 命令，因为该命令是您用来更改 <select> 值的命令。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to cy.visit() a non text/html resource will now throw a specific error message instead of bombing on page injection with an <iframe> origin error. You have to visit actual html, you cannot visit something like a .json or .png. If you’re wanting to visit an API route on your back end that does something like set cookies (thus avoiding loading your UI) you can just use cy.request() for this since it will now automatically get and set cookies under the hood. Fixes #211.
trans-unit.target: 现在尝试 cy.visit() 的非 text/html 资源将引发特定的错误消息，而不是在页面注入时使用 <iframe >原点错误轰炸。您必须访问实际的 html ，而不能访问 .json 或 .png 之类的东西。如果您想访问后端的API路由，该路由类似于设置cookie（从而避免加载UI），则可以使用 cy.request() ，因为它现在可以在后台自动获取和设置cookie。 。修复＃211。

trans-unit.target: 尝试在没有 cypress.json 的项目上运行 cypress run 现在会出错，而不是脚手架和运行厨房水槽。

trans-unit.source: Basic auth is working again in Chrome 63 and Chrome 64. We “for real” fixed it this time by adding auth headers automatically at the network proxy layer and bypassed the browser altogether. We automatically apply auth headers if you provide a username/password in the URL of a cy.visit(url). We also added a new auth option to specify the username/password using cy.visit(url, options). All of the requests that match the origin of the URL will have the Authorization: Basic <...> headers added. Fixes #1288.
trans-unit.target: 基本身份验证可在Chrome 63和Chrome 64中再次使用。这次，我们“真正”修复了此问题，方法是在网络代理层自动添加身份验证标头，并完全绕过浏览器。如果您在 cy.visit(url) 的URL中提供用户名/密码，我们将自动应用身份验证标头。我们还添加了一个新的 auth 选项，以使用 cy.visit(url, options) 指定 username/password 。所有与URL来源匹配的请求都将添加 Authorization: Basic <...> 标头。修复＃1288。

trans-unit.source: Basic auth now works again. Fixes #573.
trans-unit.target: 基本身份验证现在可以再次使用。修复＃573。

trans-unit.source: Be sure not to include any code that has side effects in your callback function. The callback function will be retried over and over again until no assertions within it throw.

trans-unit.source: Because cy.request() automatically gets and sets cookies under the hood, we can actually use it to build up state without using your browser’s UI, yet still have it perform exactly as if it came from the browser!

trans-unit.source: Because .should('have.class') does not change the subject, .and('have.attr') is executed against the same element. This is handy when you need to assert multiple things against a single subject quickly.
trans-unit.target: 因为 .should('have.class') 不会更改主题，所以 .and('have.attr') 是针对同一元素执行的。当您需要针对一个主题快速声明多个内容时，这很方便。

trans-unit.source: Because cy.clearCookie() is asynchronous it is technically possible for there to be a timeout while talking to the internal Cypress automation APIs. But for practical purposes it should never happen.

trans-unit.source: Because cy commands are asynchronous and are queued to be run later, it doesn’t make sense to return anything else.
trans-unit.target: 因为 cy 命令是异步的，并且排队等待稍后运行，所以返回任何其他命令都没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Because localhost:1234 uses a port other than 80 and 443 it must be included.
trans-unit.target: 由于 localhost:1234 使用的端口不是 80 和 443 ,因此必须包含。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress changes its own host URL to match that of your applications, it requires that your application remain on the same superdomain for the entirety of a single test.
trans-unit.target: 因为Cypress会改变自己的主机URL以匹配您的应用程序,所以要求您的应用程序在整个单次测试中都保持在同一个超级域上。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress commands are already promise-like, you don’t need to wrap them or return your own promise.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯命令已经像承诺一样，因此您无需包装它们或返回自己的承诺。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress enforces commands to run only serially, you do not need to be concerned with this in Cypress. We enqueue all commands onto a global singleton. Because there is only ever a single command queue instance, it’s impossible for commands to ever be ‘lost’.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯强制命令只能串行运行，因此您无需在赛普拉斯中对此加以关注。我们将所有命令排队到全局单例中。因为只有一个命令队列实例，所以不可能“丢失”命令。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress is installed locally on your machine, it can additionally tap into the operating system for automation tasks. This makes performing tasks such as taking screenshots, recording videos, general file system operations and network operations possible.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯是本地安装在您的计算机上的，因此它可以另外接入操作系统来执行自动化任务。这样就可以执行诸如截屏，录制视频，常规文件系统操作和网络操作之类的任务。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress is built on top of Mocha, that means any reporter built for Mocha can be used with Cypress. Here is a list of built in Mocha reporters.
trans-unit.target: 因为Cypress是建立在Mocha之上的,这意味着任何为Mocha构建的记者都可以在Cypress中使用。下面是一个内置的Mocha报告器列表。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress isn’t Selenium, we can actually take a huge shortcut here and skip needing to use our UI by using cy.request().
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯不是Selenium，因此我们实际上可以在这里采取一个巨大的捷径，而无需使用 cy.request() 来使用我们的UI 。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress operates within your application, that means it has native access to every single object. Whether it is the window, the document, a DOM element, your application instance, a function, a timer, a service worker, or anything else - you have access to it in your Cypress tests. There is no object serialization, there is no over-the-wire protocol - you have access to everything. Your test code can access all the same objects that your application code can.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯在您的应用程序内运行，这意味着它可以对每个对象进行本地访问。无论是 window ， document ，DOM元素，应用程序实例，函数，计时器，服务工作者还是其他任何东西，您都可以在赛普拉斯测试中访问它。没有对象序列化，没有在线协议-您可以访问所有内容。测试代码可以访问应用程序代码可以访问的所有相同对象。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress runs in the browser, it will never have multi-tabs support. We do have access to the browser automation APIs to actually switch tabs, but there is no reason for us to ever expose them.
trans-unit.target: 因为Cypress在浏览器中运行,所以它永远不会有多标签支持。我们确实可以使用浏览器自动化API来实际切换标签,但我们没有理由公开它们。

trans-unit.source: Because Cypress works from within the browser, Cypress must be able to directly communicate with your remote application at all times. Unfortunately, browsers naturally try to prevent Cypress from doing this.
trans-unit.target: 由于Cypress在浏览器中工作,因此Cypress必须始终能够与您的远程应用程序直接通信。不幸的是,浏览器自然会试图阻止Cypress这样做。

trans-unit.source: Because Electron is the default browser - it is typically run in CI. If you are seeing failures in CI, to easily debug them you may want to run locally with the --headed option.
trans-unit.target: 因为Electron是默认浏览器-它通常在CI中运行。如果您看到CI中的故障，为了方便地调试它们，您可能希望使用 --headed 选项在本地运行。

trans-unit.source: Because cy commands are asynchronous and are queued to be run later, it doesn’t make sense to return anything else.
trans-unit.target: 因为cy命令是异步的，并且排队等待稍后运行，所以返回任何其他命令都没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Because each operating system requires a specific build of Cypress - a new CLI tool has been created which abstracts away these differences and orchestrates the Desktop App regardless of which OS you are running.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个操作系统都需要特定的Cypress构建--我们创建了一个新的CLI工具,它可以消除这些差异,并协调桌面应用程序,无论你运行的是哪个操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Because error handling is a common idiom in most programming languages, and especially in Node, it seems reasonable to expect to do that in Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 因为在大多数编程语言中,特别是在Node中,错误处理是一个常见的习惯用语,因此,期望在Cypress中这样做似乎是合理的。

trans-unit.source: Because nothing is synchronous in modern web applications, Cypress can’t query all the DOM elements with the class todo-list and check if there are only two of them. There are many examples of why this would not work well.
trans-unit.target: 因为在现代Web应用程序中没有什么是同步的，所以Cypress不能使用 todo-list 类查询所有DOM元素并检查是否只有两个。有很多例子说明为什么这种方法不能很好地工作。

trans-unit.source: Because of the additional complexities of how Cypress considers an element visible, we now have added the exact reason why an element is not visible when throwing an error. This means you’ll see errors detailing whether an element or its parents have display: none, visibility: hidden, or whether an element is considered hidden because its effective width or height is zero. Whatever the reason, Cypress will indicate why your element is considered hidden.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯认为元素 visible 的方式更加复杂，我们现在添加了引发错误时元素不可见的确切原因。这意味着您将看到错误，详细说明一个元素或其父元素是否 display: none ， visibility: hidden ，或者某个元素是否被视为隐藏元素，因为其有效 width 或 height 为零。无论是什么原因，赛普拉斯都会指出为什么您的元素被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Because of the way Cypress is designed, if you are testing an HTTPS site, Cypress will error anytime you attempt to navigate back to an HTTP site. This behavior helps highlight a pretty serious security problem with your application.
trans-unit.target: 由于赛普拉斯的设计方式，如果您要测试HTTPS站点，则当您尝试导航回HTTP站点时，赛普拉斯将出错。此行为有助于突出显示应用程序中非常严重的安全问题。

trans-unit.source: Because of this you cannot synchronously access anything you have aliased. You must use other asynchronous commands such as .then() to access what you’ve aliased.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您无法同步访问别名的任何内容。您必须使用其他异步命令，例如 .then() 来访问已别名的内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, this global context and the version of Node is controlled by Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 正因为如此,这个全局上下文和Node的版本是由Cypress控制的。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, this global context and the version of Node is controlled under Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 正因为如此,这个全局上下文和Node的版本是在Cypress下控制的。

trans-unit.source: Because the second .contains() is chained off of a command that yielded the <button>, Cypress will look inside of the <button> for the new content.
trans-unit.target: 因为第二个 .contains() 是链接到产生 <button> 的命令的，所以赛普拉斯将在 <button> 的内部查找新内容。

trans-unit.source: Because the second assertion expect($li.get(0).textContent, 'first item').to.equal('todo a') fails, the third assertion is never reached. The command fails after timing out, and the Command Log correctly shows that the first encountered assertion should('have.length', 2) passed, but the second assertion and the command itself failed.
trans-unit.target: 因为第二个断言 expect($li.get(0).textContent, 'first item').to.equal('todo a') 失败，所以永远不会达到第三个断言。超时后命令失败，并且命令日志正确显示 should('have.length', 2) 遇到第一个断言（'have.length'，2），但是第二个断言和命令本身失败。

trans-unit.source: Because there are multiple inputs and one submit button, Cypress submits the form (and fires submit events) as well as a synthetic click event to the button.
trans-unit.target: 因为有多个 inputs 和一个 submit 按钮，丝柏提交表单（和火灾事件提交），以及合成的 click 事件的 button 。

trans-unit.source: Because there is no guarantee that code running in an after will always run.
trans-unit.target: 因为不能保证在 after 之后运行的代码将始终运行。

trans-unit.source: Because we are using chai, that means you can extend it however you’d like. Cypress will “just work” with new assertions added to chai. You can:
trans-unit.target: 因为我们使用的是 chai ，这意味着您可以随意扩展它。赛普拉斯将“工作”，并在 chai 中添加新的断言。您可以：

trans-unit.source: Because we previously tested the login system end-to-end without using any shortcuts, we already have 100% confidence it’s working correctly.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们以前没有使用任何快捷方式就端对端地测试了登录系统，所以我们已经100％确信它可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Because we’re now processing the spec files prior to handing them off to the browser, this means we will display problems like syntax errors when something in the processing goes wrong. Additionally, we print these out during cypress run, so you’re not stuck wondering what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们现在正在处理规格文件，然后再将其交给浏览器，所以这意味着当处理出现问题时，我们将显示语法错误之类的问题。另外，我们在 cypress run 期间将它们打印出来，因此您不必担心发生了什么问题。

trans-unit.source: Because we’ve used the @ character in cy.get(), instead of querying the DOM for elements, cy.get() looks for an existing alias called rows and returns the reference (if it finds it).
trans-unit.target: 由于我们在 cy.get() 中使用了 @ 字符，而不是在DOM中查询元素，因此 cy.get() 会查找一个称为 rows 的现有别名，并返回引用（如果找到）。

trans-unit.source: Before Cypress launches a browser, it gives you the ability to modify the arguments used to launch it.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯启动浏览器之前,它让你能够修改用于启动浏览器的参数。

trans-unit.source: Before Cypress launches a browser, it gives you the opportunity to modify the browser preferences, install extensions, add and remove command-line arguments, and modify other options from your pluginsFile.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯启动浏览器之前，它使您可以修改浏览器首选项，安装扩展，添加和删除命令行参数以及修改 pluginsFile 中的其他选项。

trans-unit.source: Before interacting with an element, we will always scroll it into view (including any of its parent containers). Even if the element was visible without scrolling, we perform the scrolling algorithm in order to reproduce the same behavior every time the command is run.
trans-unit.target: 在与元素进行交互之前，我们将始终将其滚动到视图（包括其任何父容器）中。即使该元素在不滚动的情况下是可见的，我们也会执行滚动算法，以便在每次运行命令时重现相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Before sending the HTTP request, we automatically attach cookies that would have otherwise been attached had the request come from the browser. Additionally, if a response has a Set-Cookie header, these are automatically set back on the browser cookies.
trans-unit.target: 在发送HTTP请求之前，如果请求来自浏览器，我们会自动附加本来会附加的Cookie。此外，如果响应具有 Set-Cookie 标头，则会在浏览器Cookie上自动设置这些标头。

trans-unit.target: 在编写 after() 或 afterEach() 挂钩之前，请先了解我们对使用 after() 或 afterEach() 清理状态的反模式的看法。

trans-unit.source: Before you can enable GitHub integration for your Cypress projects, you must first install the Cypress GitHub App. You can start the GitHub App installation process via your organization’s settings page or a project’s settings page in the Cypress Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 在为赛普拉斯项目启用GitHub集成之前，必须首先安装赛普拉斯GitHub App。您可以通过组织的设置页面或赛普拉斯仪表板中的项目设置页面开始GitHub App安装过程。

trans-unit.source: Before, you’d be forced to write custom code to protect against any and all of these issues: a nasty mashup of arbitrary waits, conditional retries, and null checks littering your tests. Not in Cypress! With built-in retrying and customizable timeouts, Cypress sidesteps all of these flaky issues.
trans-unit.target: 以前，您将不得不编写自定义代码来防止所有这些问题：任意等待的讨厌的混搭，有条件的重试和空检查，这些乱七八糟的测试乱七八糟。不在赛普拉斯！借助内置的重试和可自定义的超时功能，赛普拉斯避开了所有这些棘手的问题。

trans-unit.source: Began implementation in preparation for cross browser testing coming sometime relatively soon.
trans-unit.target: 开始实施以为跨浏览器测试做准备相对较快的时间。

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: Behavior

trans-unit.source: Behind Cypress is a Node server process. Cypress and the Node process constantly communicate, synchronize, and perform tasks on behalf of each other. Having access to both parts (front and back) gives us the ability to respond to your application’s events in real time, while at the same time work outside of the browser for tasks that require a higher privilege.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯的背后是一个节点服务器进程。赛普拉斯和Node进程之间会不断相互代表彼此进行通信，同步和执行任务。可以访问两个部分（正面和背面），使我们能够实时响应您的应用程序事件，同时可以在浏览器外部处理需要更高特权的任务。

trans-unit.source: Below we freeze the operating system’s time to Jan 1, 2018 using cy.clock() to ensure all images displaying dates and times match.
trans-unit.target: 下面我们使用 cy.clock() 将操作系统的时间冻结到 Jan 1, 2018 以确保所有显示日期和时间的图像都匹配。

trans-unit.source: Below we invoke jQuery’s val() method to set the value, then trigger the change event.
trans-unit.target: 下面我们调用jQuery的 val() 方法来设置值，然后触发 change 事件。

trans-unit.source: Below we simulate the server returning 503 with a stubbed empty JSON response body.

trans-unit.source: Beyond just integrating these tools together we have also extended and improved collaboration between these tools.

trans-unit.source: Beyond parallelization, you now have the ability to group multiple runs with each other so that they show up together (grouped) in the Dashboard. This enables you to test different applications, groups of specs, or different environments (like development, staging, production) and see all of the results together. We know how important cross browser testing is to everyone, so we built this to lead directly into aggregating the results of multiple browsers into a single run.
trans-unit.target: 除了并行化之外,您现在能够将多个运行相互分组,以便它们在仪表板中一起显示(分组)。这使您可以测试不同的应用程序、规格组或不同的环境(如开发、暂存、生产),并一起查看所有结果。我们知道跨浏览器测试对大家有多重要,所以我们建立了这个功能,直接导致将多个浏览器的结果汇总到一个运行中。

trans-unit.source: Big difference! In addition to reading much cleaner, Cypress does more than this, because Promises themselves have no concepts of retry-ability.
trans-unit.target: 巨大差距！赛普拉斯除了阅读要干净得多之外，还要做更多的事情，因为Promises本身没有可重试性的概念。

trans-unit.source: Browsers adhere to a strict same-origin policy. This means that browsers restrict access between <iframes> when their origin policies do not match.

trans-unit.source: Browsers are enormously complex pieces of software, and from time to time they will inconsistently crash for no good reason. Crashes are just a part of running automated tests.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器是非常复杂的软件，有时会无缘无故地崩溃。崩溃只是运行自动化测试的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Browsers are spawned in a Cypress specific profile so that we can maintain a clean state apart of your regular browsing usage. You will notice that your extensions are no longer installed. This is on purpose. 3rd party extensions can often get in the way of Cypress and cause failures. However, developer specific extensions for Angular, Ember, and React do not cause any issues but you’ll want to reinstall them. You only have to install them once and they will persist.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器是在赛普拉斯特定的配置文件中生成的，因此，除了您的常规浏览用法外，我们还可以保持干净的状态。您会注意到不再安装扩展程序。这是故意的。第三方扩展通常会妨碍赛普拉斯并引起故障。但是，针对Angular，Ember和React的开发人员特定扩展不会引起任何问题，但您需要重新安装它们。您只需安装一次即可，它们将继续存在。

trans-unit.source: Browsers refuse to display insecure content on a secure page. Because Cypress initially changed its URL to match https://app.corp.com when the browser followed the href to http://app.corp.com/page2, the browser will refuse to display the contents.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器拒绝在安全页面上显示不安全的内容。因为当浏览器跟随 href 到 http://app.corp.com/page2 时，赛普拉斯最初将其URL更改为与 https://app.corp.com 匹配，所以浏览器将拒绝显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: But if your app makes a request upon being initialized, the above code will not work. cy.visit() will resolve once its load event fires. The cy.intercept() command is not processed until aftercy.visit() resolves.

trans-unit.source: But if your app makes a request upon being initialized, the above code will not work. cy.visit() will resolve once its load event fires. The cy.server() and cy.route() commands are not processed until aftercy.visit() resolves.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您的应用在初始化时发出请求，则上述代码将无法正常工作。 cy.visit() 将在 load 事件触发后解析。所述 cy.server() 和 cy.route() 命令不处理，直到后 cy.visit() 消失。

trans-unit.source: But in the worst case scenario we have a situation where the <#wizard>was going to be rendered, but it didn’t render within our given timeout. Let’s assume this was due to a pending network request or WebSocket message or a queued timer, or anything else.
trans-unit.target: 但在最坏的情况下，我们有其中一种情况 <#wizard> 是要被渲染，但它并没有我们定超时内作出。假设这是由于待处理的网络请求或WebSocket消息或排队的计时器或其他任何原因造成的。

trans-unit.source: But sometimes the test fails - not usually locally, no - it almost always fails on our continuous integration server. When the test fails, the recorded video and screenshots are NOT showing any obvious problems! Here is the failing test video:
trans-unit.target: 但有时测试会失败--通常不是在本地,不是--它几乎总是在我们的持续集成服务器上失败。当测试失败时,录制的视频和截图并没有显示任何明显的问题! 这里是失败的测试视频。

trans-unit.source: But what this also means is that your test code is being evaluated inside the browser. Test code is not evaluated in Node, or any other server side language. The only language we will ever support is the language of the web: JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 但这也意味着您的测试代码正在浏览器内部进行评估。测试代码不会以Node或任何其他服务器端语言评估。在只有我们将永远支持语言是网络语言：JavaScript的。

trans-unit.source: By adding .should('not.exist') to any DOM command, Cypress will reverse its default assertion and automatically wait until the element does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .should('not.exist') 添加到任何DOM命令中，赛普拉斯将反转其默认断言，并自动等待直到该元素不存在。

trans-unit.source: By clearing cookies before each test you are guaranteed to always start from a clean slate. Starting from a clean state prevents coupling your tests to one another and prevents situations where mutating something in your application in one test affects another one downstream.
trans-unit.target: 通过在每次测试前清除cookie,您可以保证总是从一个干净的状态开始。从干净的状态开始,可以防止你的测试相互耦合,防止在一个测试中突变应用程序中的某些东西影响到下游的另一个测试。

trans-unit.source: By clearing cookies before each test you are guaranteed to always start from a clean state. Starting from a clean state prevents coupling your tests to one another and prevents situations where mutating something in your application in one test affects another one downstream.
trans-unit.target: 通过在每次测试前清除cookie,你可以保证总是从一个干净的状态开始。从一个干净的状态开始,可以防止你的测试之间的耦合,并防止在一个测试中突变你的应用程序的东西影响下游的另一个测试。

trans-unit.source: By default cy.route() inherits some of its options from cy.server().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下 cy.route() 继承了它的一些选项 cy.server() 。

trans-unit.source: By default Cypress detects if an element you’re trying to interact with is animating. This check ensures that an element is not animating too quickly for a real user to interact with the element. This also prevents some edge cases where actions, such as .type() or .click(), happened too fast during a transition.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯会检测您要与之交互的元素是否正在设置动画。此检查可确保元素的动画制作速度不会太快，以至于实际用户无法与该元素进行交互。这也可以防止某些 .type() 情况，例如.type（）或 .click() 等动作在过渡期间发生得太快。

trans-unit.source: By default Cypress seeds this file for new projects, but if you have an existing project just create this file yourself.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Cypress为新项目提供种子文件,但如果你有一个现有的项目,只需自己创建这个文件。

trans-unit.source: By default Cypress will automatically include the support file cypress/support/index.js. This file runs before every single spec file . We do this purely as a convenience mechanism so you don’t have to import this file in every single one of your spec files.

trans-unit.source: By default each command that retries, does so for up to 4 seconds - the defaultCommandTimeout setting. You can change this timeout for all commands using your configuration file, a CLI parameter, via an environment variable, or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，每个重试命令最多 defaultCommandTimeout 4秒钟-defaultCommandTimeout设置。您可以使用配置文件，CLI参数，通过环境变量或以编程方式更改所有命令的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: By default, cy.screenshot() only captures your application under test. You may want it to capture the entire Test Runner for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， cy.screenshot() 仅捕获您正在测试的应用程序。您可能希望它捕获整个Test Runner以进行调试。

trans-unit.source: By default, cy.readFile() asserts that the file exists and will fail if it does not exist. It will retry reading the file if it does not initially exist until the file exists or the command times out.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， cy.readFile() 断言该文件存在，如果不存在则将失败。如果在文件存在或命令超时之前最初不存在该文件，它将重试读取该文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, cy.trigger() fires Event. But you may want to trigger other events like MouseEvent or KeyboardEvent.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， cy.trigger() 触发 Event 。但是您可能想触发其他事件，例如 MouseEvent 或 KeyboardEvent 。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress automatically takes a screenshot when there is a failure when running cypress run, but you can disable this.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当运行 cypress run 失败时，赛普拉斯会自动拍摄屏幕截图，但是您可以禁用它。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress comes packaged with the Browserify Preprocessor already installed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯随附了已安装的Browserify预处理器。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress comes packaged with the webpack preprocessor already installed.

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress expects your cypress.json to be found where your package.json is. However, you can point Cypress to run in a different location.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯希望在您的 package.json 所在的位置找到 cypress.json 。但是，您可以将赛普拉斯指向在其他位置运行。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress is configured to ignore requests that are used to fetch static content like .js or .html files. This keeps the Command Log less noisy. This option can be changed by overriding the default whitelisting in the cy.server() options.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯配置为忽略用于获取静态内容（如 .js 或 .html 文件）的请求。这样可以使命令日志的噪音更少。可以通过覆盖 cy.server() 选项中的默认白名单来更改此选项。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress keeps 50 tests worth of snapshots and command data for time traveling. If you are seeing extremely high memory consumption in your browser, you may want to lower the numTestsKeptInMemory in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯会保留50个测试值的快照和命令数据用于时间旅行。如果您看到在您的浏览器非常高的内存消耗，你可能要降低 numTestsKeptInMemory 在你的配置。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress passes the Chrome command line switch to enable a fake video for a media stream. This is to better enable testing webcam functionality without having to have the necessary hardware to test.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,赛普拉斯通过Chrome命令行开关来启用媒体流的假视频。这是为了更好地实现测试网络摄像头功能,而不需要有必要的硬件来测试。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress will automatically find and allow you to use the browsers installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,赛普拉斯会自动找到并允许您使用系统上安装的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: By default, Cypress will automatically set Content-Type and Content-Length based on what your response body looks like.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，赛普拉斯将根据 response body 外观自动设置 Content-Type 和 Content-Length 。
